ha_review: Soap opera mai tashe dake warwarewa akan backdrop na darasin gargaɗin tahiri dake tunatar damu cewa a Najeriya, iya yawan abubuwa da suka sauya, iya yawan da zasu tsaya da hauka.
Aiki mai matuƙar yawa da tantancewa ya tafi zuwa yin wannan. Irin wannan matuƙar yawa, ingancinshi yayi fice a sauƙaƙe kuma da zarra. Tsabagen yawan ingancin a sauƙaƙe mai burgewa ne.

My village people shiri ne da zai saka ka rasa tarbiyyar gidanku yayin da kake kallon shi. Amma mai nemo hanya ne na nau'ika. Nollywood gaba ɗaya batayi aiki mai kyau ba na sanya shu'umancin motsa sha'awa da birgewa. My Village People ya sameshi cikin sauƙi, kuma ya cancanci yabo mai ɗumbin yawa.

Labarin ba komi bane da bamu taɓa gani ba a baya amma an faɗeshi daga mahangar Najeriya, yanada ban dariya, wanda ba'a sabayi ba kuma maganganun yayi kyau idan aka dangantashi da wasu da ake dasu a kasuwar Najeriya.. . . . Gaba ɗaya na ji daɗin shirin, tabbas zan bada shawarar shi (ga jama'a ta na Naija!).
Shekarun1980, masu sufurin ƙwaya, kyawawan baƙaƙen mata ... Ina cikin aljanna

Na gaskiya amma da  jinkirin tafiya kuma yayi melodrama dayawa.. . . . Wasan kwaikwayo mai kyau, akan lamuran gaskiya kuma labari mai kyau. Tafiyan yayi ɗan jinkiri dayawa ma so na kuma wasu guraren sunyi kamar shirin anyi-don-talabijin(sautin mai daɗi da yawan wasan kwaikwayo).. . . . Gaba ɗaya za'a iya kallo idan ka san me kake samu cikin gaban lokaci.
Gyara.. . . . Nagode da wannan. An burgeni da shi. Amma Ni Nelson Orah ya fito a matsayin Ahmad, ba Umar ba. Zan yaba da shi idan aka gyara.
Ta kasance' matuƙar kyau! Zaka so ka kalli wannan shirin. Wannan shiri mai kyau ne na ban mamaki. Zallan abin so na Nollywood.

An ƙayatar dani bayan kallon shirin, komai yayi yanda akeso. An burgeni musamman da ingancin jerin 'yan wasa da ma'aikata. Mai bada umarni, Kemi Adetiba tayi aiki mai kyau kuma ina alfahari da ita. Na bada shawararshi ga mutane dayawa. Na zuba ido don kallon wasu aikin ta.

Genevieve Nnaji ta tsaida ƙafafunta da kyau a cikin manyan masu bada umarni masu baiwa. Bata bada kunya a sabon fitowan ta,Lion Heart. Ya kasance na kallo dole, da ya sanar da farkon Nollywood ɗin duniya.
Nollywood a ƙololuwan ta!!!!. . . . Wannan shirin ya bada labari akan al'ada, haɗin kai da iyali. Take masu ɗumbin yawa da bazan iya gama faɗansu ba.
Shiri mai kyau da hikima. Ya kasance shiri mai kyau, da ya nuna hatsarin ƙabilancin Najeriya da yanda zaiyi tasiri a ƙaramar soyayya.
wannan shirin kyauta ce mai kyau a cikin nau'in.

Na so wannan shirin. . . . Naji mamaki sosai da na karanta magana marar kyau ma wannan shirin. Shin dagaske mun san ya shiri mai kyau yake? Wannan shiri yayi kyau sosai, na jin daɗi sosai.  'Yan cikin wasan an bunƙasa su da kyau, layin labari na iya yarda ne da na iya kamantawa. Da ingancin, mai kyau. Sannunku gayu. Na so shi har fiye da wedding party na 1 da na 2. Ba'a bani kunya ba gaba ɗaya.
Naga nunawan farko a Houston Texas. . . . Wannan shirin ya kamata ya samu lambar yabo daga Oscar. Layin labarin yayi kyau. Jaruman duka sun kasance masu ban mamaki.
Duk wanda yake son fasaha, Wanda  ya ga kashi na ɗaya zai san fulotin da layin labarin sun kasance tuni a gine dEré kuma wannan abinda bibiya ne.
Sakamako mai kyau.

Bayyanannen shiri. . . . Wannan yayi kyau sosai kuma shiri daban. Wasu mutanen ba lallai su so shi ba ta yuwu saboda sun saba da shirye-shiryen soyayya ko na ƙayatarwa ko kuma ta yuwu saboda basu saba rayuwa tareda abin hawa ba. su shirin dagaske ya nuna yanda abubuwa suke a haƙiƙa a cikin rayuwar makaniki, masu koyo da abokan cinikayya. Yana kuma malamai iyaye da yara darasi mai kyau. Ya kasance kamar bayyanannen shiri mai kyau.
Understated, wasan kwaikwayo mai ƙarfin crime tareda ɗanɗanon tarihi. . Wannan shiri ne mai cike da 'yan wasa. Babu guri ɗaya da akayi asararshi.
Cigaba mai kyau har zuwa ƙarshen shirin... Marubucin da mai bada umarni yanada basira da iya ƙirƙira. Na gode sosai don wannan shirin mai ban mamaki

Na ji daɗin ganin ɓangarorin Lagos masu kyau sosai, duk a cikin gari da tsibirin, da akayi amfani, ba kamar wasu shirye-shiryen da suka tsaya a guri ɗaya ba. Lagos gurine mai kyau don ɗaukan shiri, musamman idan aka saka rabe-raben garin a aiki,kamar yanda aka gani a nan. Guraren hatsari sau dayawa suna bada matsalan nunawa ga Nollywood, amman ya kasance abin ban mamaki mai gamsarwa na ganin wanda za'a iya gaskatawa sosai anan.
Ambato shirin. . Cikakken shiri. Naso dukkan daƙiƙa ma shirin. Nayi fatan bai ƙare ba.

Sabon bada umarni na Akinnuoye-Agbaje ya kasance labarin zamani mai matsala akan masaniyar kai na darakta a matsayin 'kulawa da yaro' na yaron Najeriya a UK a lokacin ƙaruwan ƙyamar baƙi a tashi tsayen isowar zamanin Windrush.Kallo da yanayin farkon lokacin shirye-shirye yana gabatar da tsari na 'yan wasa sababbi kuma na gaske cewa wani kawai zai iya ganowa daga samun masaniyar su. Yanayin tafiyan shirin ta hanyoyi dayawa ya hasko wannan.Wani lokacin kamar yanason ɗaukan kusan takun fama da fargaba wanda yake mai ma'ana a cikin hanya dake gano sakamakon wani yana tuna labarin rayuwar su- ƙunshe da bayanai masu amfani da lokutan tashin hankali - amma ba koda yaushe ba wanda yake sakashi wahalar ganowa da yaba wucewan lokacin iyaka akan  abin al'ajabi. 'Yan wasa masu taimakawa suma sababbi ne kuma daƙilewa da za'a iya bayyanarwa amma sun gaza a zurfin da ake buƙata don zama cikakkun 'yan wasa fiye da hulɗar su tareda jagaban shirin. Bugu da ƙari shirin yayi kaɗan don taɓo ko bada muhallin tsarin shi, da gangan sun zaɓi mayar da hankali akan gwagwarmayar ciki na jagaban ɗan wasan shi. Dukda hakan jagaban ɗan wasan shirin yana tursasawa don ajiye mai kallo jiɓinta shi ɗaya a cigaban shi har zuwa ƙarshen shirin.Gaba ɗaya Farming sabon bada umarni ne mai burgewa dake shawo kan al'amura masu shaida biyu da tsanan- kai a yanayin dake barin abu dayawa da ba'a faɗa ba amma yana kawo bayanai masu saka ɓacin rai mai ɗaci kuma akai-akai na gwagwarmayar mutane don ma'ana da shaida. Akwai abubuwa dayawa sosai don martabawa gameda wannan shiri wanda ya gabatar da lokacin kau da kai sau dayawa a tarihin Britaniya, amfanin irin wannan batun sirri da ya cancanci babban lokacin yi akan shirye-shiryen mere mintuna 107.
shirin mai ban mamaki kallo dole
Shiri mai dogon zango mai kyau. . Ina matuƙar son wannan wasan. Duka 'yan wasan sunyi dakyau kuma na ji daɗin kallo. Fatan zai tsaya kusa don ƙarin zango. Ina zuba ido don ganin zango na gaba!!!

Yin aiki daga wani rubutu na marubuci Darci Picoult, Dosunmu fashions labari da ya kasance na gaskiya, na melodrama kuma takamamme na al'ada (mun ɗauki lokaci mai yawa muna kallon riguna masu tsarin launuka kamar yanda muka yi sha'awa mara ƙarewa a nunin fuskar Gurira), tukunna abun misali marar kuskure.
Shiri mai kyau!

Babu kalmomi don bayyana ƙarfin wannan shirin da tunatarwar shi na yanda yayi sa'a da bai taɓa zama cikin yaƙin basasa. Bada labarin na ban mamaki ne na tashin hankali, tarihin Najeriya na kwanannan da tausayi a cikin shi gaba ɗaya.
Mai kyau
Nuni bisa hujja na inyamurai. . . . Lion heart ya nuna menene haƙiƙanin nufin zama inyamuri- aiki-tuƙuru da rayuwar mulkin gargajiya.

Akwai yawan wasan kwaikwayo matsakaici a nan da can kuma wasu abubuwan sun yi kaɗan zuwa babu ma'ana a gurina amman gaba ɗaya naji daɗinshi a yanda yake. Ta yuwu bazan ƙara kallon shi ba har abada amma kallon shi sau ɗaya yayi daɗi.

Yayin da taken nan sun kasance, tabbas, tuno da ambaton siffanta talauci a sauƙaƙe, masu haɗa shirin basuyi amincewa na rashin gaskiya ba na abinda ya wuce na sinima ba. Muryar su tasu ce; Kamarar tana tafiya lokacina da ya kamata, amma tana tsaye a guri ɗaya lokuta dayawa, da ke barin mafi kyawun jerin 'yan wasa su gina rawar da zasu taka a matakin abubuwan da zasu faru na shirin gwajin juriyar su.
Ban dariya Ban dariya Ban dariya. . . . oh mehn, wannan shirin mai matuƙar ban dariya ne. Idan kana neman shiri don saka ka cikin yanayin farin ciki to wannan shine shiri daidai don kai.
Shiri mai kyau!!. . Wannan ya kamata ya zama shiri mafi kyau da zai fito daga Najeriya, ba don a ambaci na matuƙar ban dariya!
KYAKKYAWAN MATAN AFIRKI

Ban san a kan wani dalili mutane suka bama wannan shirin irin wannan ƙarancin kima amman ku yarda dani bayan lokaci mai tsayi na kalla irin wannan shiri na ƙwarai, mai kyau, tsaftatacce kuma wanda yafi shirin Bollywood.
Ingancin hoton shirinnan yayi kyau, kuma mai bada umarnin yayi aiki mai kyau.
Aiki mai kyau. . . . Aikin Temi Otedola yayi kyau dagaske. Gaba ɗaya naji daɗin shimfiɗar da shirin yake dashi da kuma yanda aka bayyana kowani yankin bayanai.

Babban taku a cikin mayar da ruwayar mu. . . . Wannan shiri haƙiƙa ya nuna ɓangare mai zurfi na gwagwarmayar mutanen da muke yawan watsi da su. Sauƙin ganin mutum don yanke hukunci, amma idan aka faɗi labarai irin wa'ennan zaka fara kallon kowa da nufi daban daban. Ƙarshen, amma kwatsam ya ajiyeka a cikin rashin tabbas kuma ya riƙeka a zargi mai da waswasi a kan abinda yanzu ka shaida.
Ya tsaru!!!🔥🔥🔥. . Tabbas shirin Afirka na shekarar, Naji daɗin kowani minti na awa 2 da minti 30 😀👏👏👏🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥✔️✌️
Labari ba na kasafai ba gameda kimar iyali daga ra'ayi mabanbanta. Anyi fassarar shi a fayyace tareda zaɓin 'yan wasa cikakke.
Daga ƙarshe babban shirin Najeriya. A shekaru dayawa nayi fatan cewa Najeriya zata samar da shiri babba sosai, kuma daga nan ne inda 'yan uwa Esiri suka shigo ciki.
Gaskiya wannan shirin samarwa ne mai kyau hikima kuma mabiyi. Daɗi daga wasan kwaikwayo ingantacce.

Da wuya idan akwai lokacin minti 5 a cikin wannan shiri tareda babu abinda za'ayi murmushi, dariyar ciki ko dariya akai. Bana tunanin akwai wani shirin Najeriya da yakai wannan a nau'in shi (ƙagaggen labarin ban dariya). Tasirin shirin sun kasance abin yabawa suma.
Shirin soyayyan ban dariya na Nollywood mai kyau. . Wannan shiri yayi haƙiƙanin daɗi isasshe da zai saka ka dariya bayan rana marar daɗi.
Shirin da ya haɗa ƙasashe mai kyau. . . . Abinda kawai da banaso gameda wannan shirin shine yanda akwai kaɗan zuwa babu hulɗa tareda gwamnatin Najeriya ko Indiya.. . . . Shirin soyayya mai kyau.
Labarin ya fara a ɗan hankali amma a tsaya a haka. Labari mai kyau sosai.

King of boys. . . . Wannan shiri mai dogon zango yayi matuƙar kyau haƙiƙa, daga layin labarin zuwa jerin 'yan wasa, kayayyaki da kuma motsin zuciyan da jaruman suka nuna. Ina tabbas alfahari da zama ɗan Najeriya a wannan lokacin. Da kyau Kemi Adetiba, da kyau Sola Solowale!

Na kallo dole na kowa da kowa. . . . Namaste wahala ya ƙawatu kuma a hukumance haɗi tsakanin al'adu. Wannan haɗin gwiwa na Nollywood da Bollywood nada komai a shirin soyayya mai kyau da ya kamata yanada shi. Jaruman indiyan sun yi da kyau kuma sun taka rawarsu da kyau sosai.

Na haƙiƙa, mai nishaɗantarwa da ko ina vibes mai daɗi. Zan iya kallon shi a a rana gaba ɗaya. Ina fatan zasu nuna na sama da sati ɗaya amma. Bayan hakan, kawai yayi kyau. Yawancin wasan kwaikwayo na gaske suna  fitowa a matakin rubutu amma ba wannan ba.
A kan ma'aunin Nollywood zan bawa wannan shirin 9 saboda layin labari na musamman da samarwa mai matuƙar kyau wanda ya saita shi gefen wasu shirye-shiryen Najeriya
Layin labari mai kyau. . . . Ya kasance shiri mai kyau da layin labari. Ina son shi.

Babu abin faɗa;. . . . Wannan shirin ya saka tsikar jikina ta tashi Na haɗa a hanyar da a zahiri ya bani tausayi. Lallai siffanta Ubangiji ta hanya da yanda ya kamata Allah ya ma marubuci, masu samarwa da duka wanda da hannunsu a ciki albarka. Suma jaruman sunyi da kyau kowa yayi aiki mai kyau.
Naji daɗin alaƙar da ta ƙagu tsakanin Mr Tayo (Bimbo Manuel) da Ejiro (RMD),
Abu ɗaya da nake so gameda shirin shine yanda aka faɗi labarin da yanda jaruman suka fassara shi. Marubutan, masu bada umarni masu cinematogography sun cancanci tafi don wannan ƙoƙarin.

Shirin kirista mafi kyau!!!. . .   Ina son wannan shirin! Yayi da kyau sosai - Wasan kwaikwayon yayi matuƙar kyau kuma layin labarin ya kasance na shaƙatarwa. Yabo zuwa gaba ɗaya 'yan wasa da ma'aikata! Tabbas na kallo-dole!. . . . P. S. Zaka buƙaci takardar goge-goge.

Na so shi!. . Ina  son shirin, jaruman, mai bada umarni da sauransu. Haƙiƙa kowa ya saka shi zama mai kyau tare da baiwar wasan kwaikwayon su. . . . Duk wanda ya same shi a rashin kyau a bayyane bai san shiri mai kyau ba, kuma yana yiwuwa ba zai iya danganta da al'adunmu ba.
Matukar kyau. . . . Shirin yayi matuƙar kyau tare da kyawawan 'yan wasa. Ina son ganin Bisola a shirye-shirye, Tana da ƙoƙari.
Wasan kwaikwayo mai kyau, bada umarni mai kyau, ba wani babban labari ba. . Sai na buɗe shafi don bitar wannan shirin. Wannan aikin fasaha ne mai kyau.. .

Mai ban sha'awa. . . . Naji daɗin shirinnan sosai. Wasan kwaikwayon da layin labarin sunyi kyau sosai. Na same shi da zama mai ban sha'awa don mamaki akan rayuwar Ishi - wannan tabbas abin buɗe ido ne ga dayawa wanda ake tursasa su cikin aure.
Gabriel Afolayan a cikin ajin kanshi yake a matsayin jarumi; Yana fahimtar aikin shi a koda yaushe.
Baiyi muni kamar yanda akayi bita ba.
Shiri mai kyau kuma aiki mai kyau. . . . Shiri mai kyau ingantacce aiki mai kyau da ban dariya mai kyau an haɗa duka cikin ɗaya. Shiri mai ƙayatarwa da jerin 'yan wasa mai kyau.
An yi da kyau, almara mai kyau da tafiya a tsanake da dukda haka yana gwagwarmaya don daidaita buƙatun melodrama tare da tura shi don kamo lokacin tarihi.

Mai matuƙar kyau. . . .  Lokaci na farko dana ga wannan shiri an burgeni. Bana so a ɗauka da shirme amma na yi ƙoƙarin nazarin abubuwan wannan duniyar. Ina fatan ganin kashi na biyu tare da 'yan wasa iri ɗaya da fuloti mai duhu.

Mai ban mamaki. .  Zan kamar koda yaushe flicked wuce wannan, amma gaskiya labarine mai ban mamaki. Zaka iya cewa yana da ƙarancin kasafin kuɗi, amma bada umarnin da nuna wasan na ban mamaki ne! Shirya guraren faɗa ya rasa kaɗan. Ya cancanci kallo tabbas
Labari na maida hankali na iyali da yaƙi. . . . Na bada shawarar shi ba tareda ajiya ba

Wow. . . . Wannan shiri lallai ya saka ni sauya alaƙa ta zuwa mafi kyau. Babban shiri. Shirin da gaske ya fara da jinkiri amma tabbas ya bani sha'awa. Tuno bayan lallai ya saka ƙarshen yawan tsanani saboda komai ya haɗu a guri ɗaya.
Mutane baza su taɓa koya ba idan basuyi ko ƙoƙari ba.. . . . Wannan shiri ya magance al'amura da yawa wanda ya haɗa da babban su gaba ɗaya. Rikicin asali a cikin baƙaƙen maza.

Ta cikin tattalin arziki na gamsasshen bayani, Eyimofe, (aka fassara shi a "Wannan shine muradi na") yana bada hoto na duniya gaba ɗaya mara lokaci na juriyar mutum yayin tsayar da Arie da Chuko a matsayin maraban sabon ƙari ga damuwan haɗa shiri.
Ya kasance babban shiri ne daga wani wanda muka sani da ya zamo babban mai bada labari. Gold Statue ta yuwu ba ɗayan mafi kyawun aiyukan Tade Ogidan bane, amma ya yi matsayi a can sama
Shiri mai kyau. . . . Layin labari mai kyau. Ya cancanci kallo. Tabbas zan bada shawarar kallon shi.
Wannan ya kasance abin daɗi don kallo. . . . The Delivery Boy na shaƙatawa ne sosai, labari mai kyau, an bada shi da hazaƙa. Ya kamata ku kalle shi!

Ya kamata wannan wasan yana da zango 5!!!!. . . . Wannan wasa yayi daɗi da nishaɗantarwa. Idan asalin Caliphate yana da matsala dashi. A sauya ko taƙaita kalmar sunan, ina roƙo. Gerin 'yan wasa mai kyau!!! Rubutu mai mai!!! Kallo mai kyau. :)

Babban shiri. . . . Bazan iya don rayuwa ta fahimtar ƙarancin sharhi ma irin wannan shiri na musamman. Shiri mai dogon zangon yayi kyau sosai da na ta kallon shi gaba ɗaya  shiri mai dogon zangon a matsayin ɗalibin likitanci. Aiki mai kyau da jinjina ga mai shiryawa da 'yan wasa.
